ygData.subject: Re: Screaming Terror-New effects
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ... No, you can t...at least not when it works the way it s supposed to.  ST lasts 18 seconds and is broken by *any* damage...melee or otherwise
ygData.messageBody:
> I haven't tested that either. I have just assumed that it wouldn't work
> since the patch said that they sit until they take damage. Has anyone
> tested it? I want to try the disease type spells. Since they stop the
> healing, maybe we can use Disease and ST to keep them status quo while we
> med back up.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Aazen1@... [mailto:Aazen1@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 1999 12:19 AM
> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Screaming Terror-New effects
>
>
> From: Aazen1@...
>
> Since ST is now a mez type spell, can you pile all your DOTs onto a
> creature,
> then mez it and let it just sit there frying?Can't test myself yet, cause
I
> don't get the spell for 3 more levels . . .

No, you can't...at least not when it works the way it's supposed to. ST
lasts 18 seconds and is broken by *any* damage...melee or otherwise
(including DOT) However...the way things are right now you occasionally get
a good 30-40 second stun on the creature and it will sit there taking
everything you can dish out. GZ stated in a news post that they would fix
this ASAP. I've also run into this scenario..2 mobs, one ST'd the other
being taken down by party/pet. Once that first mob is dead your pet will
turn on the 2nd one if it hit you, or the pet at any time..just a heads up
:)
